title: About
text:
One of Nepalâ€™s Oldest and Most Trusted Bookstore | Since 1961 A.D.
At Educational Enterprise, weâ€™ve been igniting minds and nurturing a love for learning since 1961. As a leading bookstore, distributor, and publisher, we offer more than just books â€” we provide a pathway to knowledge, growth, and inspiration. Whether youâ€™re pursuing academic excellence, seeking personal development, or getting lost in a captivating story, our shelves are filled with books that cater to every interest and passion.

Age, gender, or past experiences donâ€™t define you; itâ€™s your ambition and your desire for wholeness that matter. We are here to guide you on that journey, today and beyond.

At Educational Enterprise, every book is a stepping stone toward broader horizons.
